name: VoidCraft
description:
This showcases a game application made on Unity3D that was aimed to demonstrate 3D modeling and game scripting for a space shooter.

All 3D models used in the project were made on 3DS Max and Blender and imported to Unity3D in FBX format.

  • Spaceships
  • Projectile
  • Enemy AI
  • Destructibles (Asteroids)
  • Items and Inventory System
  • Quests
